title: Telnet-Vision Area Restore Function
description:
TN_SC_AREA_RESTORE enables recovery of previously saved 

screen area. The screen data in Xus_TN_SCREEN.bya_BACKUP [x] is 

restored using the stored coordinates. This is done mainly done after the 

call from the module MENU-BAR amd MENU-POPUP, to restore the modifed 

screen.
name: TN_SC_AREA_RESTORE

input.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
input.description: Input parameter representing the screen data containing the backup to be restored.

return_value.description: No return value. The function performs restoration on the provided screen data.
